title: DeepSeek-Powered Bookstack Workflow
body_html:
DeepSeek-Powered Bookstack Workflow

This workflow leverages DeepSeek Reasoner for efficient Bookstack content creation.

Steps:

  1. Transcript Submission: Send a short transcript of the relevant conversation to DeepSeek Reasoner.
  2. Draft Generation: DeepSeek Reasoner generates the first draft of the Bookstack document based on the transcript.
  3. Review and Modification: Review the generated draft, making necessary modifications and improvements.
  4. Bookstack Upload: Upload the final, reviewed version of the document to Bookstack.

Benefits:

  • Utilizes DeepSeek's text generation capabilities.
  • Mitigates DeepSeek's high latency by using it asynchronously.
  • Ensures content quality through a human review step.
